item.description:
Well, as we have all heard by now (per yesterday's email) Timmy Maia has cancelled his show at Lucky Lou's. For those of you who anticipated his performance, I apologize for any inconvenience. However, we still plan to try this great new venue and just basically hang out with friends. Come on out and have some great food, a drink or two and some laughs with us. Don't sit home...let's try it and see what the rave is about. Check out some of the local reviews...

Good Lucking Out – Hartford Advocate [pdf download]

“…There’s a long history of eateries at the Standish House. Other former restaurants at the same location have tried to make the spot work with an Asian fusion menu, but the folks behind Lucky Lou’s have gone for a menu that fuses classic Mediterranean elements with an upscale American comfort sensibility. And the whole thing is wisely reined-in…[T]he staff and customers seemed to all be having a genuinely good time when I visited. That’s something you can’t manufacture.”

A La Carte – Hartford Courant [pdf download]

“…The historic Old Wethersfield section of Wethersfield is taking on a new look and a new taste, thanks to its newest restaurant addition, Lucky Lou’s Bar & Grill.”

Now, check out the menu...

http://www.luckylousbarandgrill.com/happy-hour/#food

BTW...Please remember to update your RSVP if your plans change.
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Lucky Lou's... Hang Out With Us !!!
